content: I'm looking at the US Core CCDA-on-FHIR implementation guide and I don't see any extension for religion. What's the direction of the group on this?
that is a FHIR core extension: http://build.fhir.org/extension-patient-religion.html
but not part of the US Core patient profile.
Thanks! I was told it was required for C-CDA, but that turns out not to be the case.
